org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.LLCManager

Class LLCCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uclab.mm.icl.llc.LLCManager.LLCCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LLCCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is counter class which is required in the recognition process of low level context. With this runnable class, each recognized context are unified in predefined window period.
    Author:
    Nailbrainz

    • Constructor Detail

      • LLCCounter

        public LLCCounter(long userID,
                  java.lang.String startTime,
                  java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService es,
                  LLCUnifier unifier,
                  LLCNotifier notifier,
                  ContextType ct,
                  java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean flag)
        Unique constructor of the LLCCounter instance
        Parameters:
        userID - user ID to set on counter
        startTime - startTime of the counting
        es - executorservice to run the thread
        unifier - unifier instance, which stores all the recognized low level context
        notifier - notifier instance, which will be used in notifying unified labels into DCL
        ct - contextType of the counter instance
        flag - Flag variable, indicating whether the counter is running or not.
